<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92714</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92714</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Clair de lune</string>
            <string language="en">Moonlight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mondschein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moonlight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Moonlight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σεληνόφωτο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Claro de luna</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la lune réfléchissant la lumière du soleil vers la terre. Les phases de la lune comme elles sont vues de la terre dépendent des positions relatives des trois corps.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Moon reflecting the light from the Sun towards the Earth. The phases of the Moon as seen from Earth depends on the relative positions of the three bodies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">phases lunaires</string>
            <string language="en">lunar phases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">clair de lune</string>
            <string language="en">moonlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Mond, der das Licht von
der Sonne in Richtung zur Masse reflektiert. Die Phasen des 
Mondes, wie von der Masse gesehen hängt von den relativen Positionen 
der drei Körper ab.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a lua que reflete a luz 
do sol para a terra. As fases da lua como vistas da terra 
dependem das posições relativas dos três corpos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la luna che riflette 
la luce dal sole verso la terra. Le fasi della luna come viste 
da terra dipende dalle posizioni relative dei tre corpi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το φεγγάρι απεικονίζοντας
το φως από τον ήλιο προς τη γη. Οι φάσεις του φεγγαριού 
όπως βλέπουνε από τη γη εξαρτώνται από τις σχετικές 
θέσεις των τριών οργανισμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la luna que refleja la 
luz del sol hacia la tierra. Las fases de la luna según lo 
considerado de la tierra dependen de las posiciones relativas de los 
tres cuerpos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mondphasen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mondschein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fases lunares</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">moonlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fasi lunari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">moonlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σεληνιακές φάσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σεληνόφωτο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fases lunares</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">claro de luna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
